name: Aabharan Nrushingha Rout
about: B.Tech CSE (AI & ML) student at SRM IST (GPA: 9.5). I build privacy‑first AI agents, generative models, and production‑ready pipelines with a focus on reliability and deployment.

education.school: SRM Institute of Science and Technology (SRM IST)

projects.title: Strategia Reader — Offline Enterprise Knowledge Agent
projects.summary: Privacy‑first offline Q&A agent that ingests company policies and answers without external APIs.
bullets: FAISS retrieval + Llama‑2‑7B (Ollama) with cached embeddings (~3s responses on RTX 3060).
Prompt‑injection filtering, rate‑limiting, Docker Compose deployment, and streamlined onboarding docs.
Benchmarked vs cloud RAG tools: ~25% faster response latency with zero data leakage.

projects.title: Proteus — Generative AI for Protein Backbones
projects.summary: Conditional diffusion model to generate 3D protein backbones from secondary‑structure tokens.
bullets: Curated 2,100 non‑redundant PDB chains; trained DDPM to ~2.5 Å backbone RMSD on held‑out data.
Exported .pdb outputs; integrated FoldSeek/DSSP eval for rapid structural assessment.
Visualization with PyMOL; extended framework for antibody/protein therapeutic design.

projects.title: Smart Algo‑Trader — Automated Strategy Pipeline
projects.summary: End‑to‑end algo‑trading system: signal generation, backtesting, deployment, and monitoring.
bullets: Backtested 2021–2023 (AAPL/MSFT/GOOGL): outperformed buy‑and‑hold by 8% with max drawdown <7%.
Automated logging (Google Sheets), Telegram alerts, GitHub Actions cron, Streamlit monitoring dashboard.
Docker‑based broker‑ready deployment with walk‑forward optimization and dynamic risk controls.

awards.title: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure — Generative AI Professional
Python for Data Science A–Z — Udemy
